Package a3

Class Crop

java.lang.Object
a3.Crop
public class Crop extends Object
Crop represents a planted seed in the game, tracking its growth cycle, watering state, and final harvested state. It manages timing for maturation, swapping obj upon readiness, and notifying growth events.
Author:
Isabel Santoyo-Garcia

  • Constructor Details

    • Crop

      public Crop(String type, double growTimeSeconds, ObjShape targetShape, TextureImage targetTexture)
      Constructs a new Crop with specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      type - crop type string
      growTimeSeconds - time in seconds until maturity
      targetShape - shape to display at maturity
      targetTexture - texture to display at maturity

  • Method Details

    • update

      public void update()
      Updates the crop's internal timer and swaps in the matured crop obj & texture when the grow time has elapsed.

    • water

      public void water(double seconds)
      Waters the crop once, reducing its remaining grow time by the specified amount. Only effective a single time per crop.
      Parameters:
      seconds - number of seconds to subtract from remaining grow time

    • isReadyToHarvest

      public boolean isReadyToHarvest()
      Checks if the crop has reached maturity and is ready for harvest.
      Returns:
      true if ready to harvest

    • hasGrown

      public boolean hasGrown()
      Checks if the crop has been updated to mature state.
      Returns:
      true if the mature appearance has been applied

    • setHasGrown

      public void setHasGrown(boolean value)
      Sets the internal grown state of the crop.
      Parameters:
      value - true to mark the crop as grown

    • setPlantedObject

      public void setPlantedObject(GameObject obj)
      Associates the visual GameObject with this crop instance.
      Parameters:
      obj - the GameObject representing the planted crop

    • getPlantedObject

      public GameObject getPlantedObject()
      Retrieves the GameObject tied to this crop.
      Returns:
      the planted GameObject, or null if not set

    • getType

      public String getType()
      Gets the crop's type string.
      Returns:
      the type of this crop

    • isHarvested

      public boolean isHarvested()
      Checks if this crop has already been harvested.
      Returns:
      true if harvested

    • markHarvested

      public void markHarvested()
      Marks the crop as harvested, preventing further harvest actions.

    • getId

      public UUID getId()
      Returns this crop's unique identifier.
      Returns:
      the UUID of this crop

    • setId

      public void setId(UUID id)
      Sets the UUID for this crop (used when syncing remote crops).
      Parameters:
      id - the UUID to assign

    • forceGrowNow

      public void forceGrowNow()
      Forces the crop to mature immediately, swapping its obj model & texture. Does nothing if already mature.

    • updateAndCheckReady

      public boolean updateAndCheckReady()
      Advances growth and returns true if the crop just transitioned to ready state and has not yet been notified.
      Returns:
      true if newly ready and not previously notified
